name: Website: mapquest adblock and center
description: gets rid of the ads and centers the content.  this code is now included in Frank (DesertFox)'s Adblock with style - compilation, if you use that, then you don't need this, but if you just want mapquest stuff, you can use this.
obsoletion_message: a bit buggy right now, i'll unobsolete it when i'm finished correcting this.

discussions.name: All us fellow stylemakers need to do this
